nodes.text: Star Wars Trilogy: Collector's Edition is a Borders exclusive volume that collects into one the three junior novelizations of the original trilogy by Ryder Windham published by Scholastic: A New Hope, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi.
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....
Here, in one epic volume, is the trilogy that matches the courageous, young Luke Skywalker against the tyrannical Darth Vader--and the power of hope against the forces of evil.
Relive every moment of the action-packed movies in this value-priced collector's edition!

Episode IV: A New Hope
Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back
Episode VI: Return of the Jedi
